channel.title: Quest Tab
channel.description: Hi im wanting to make a quest tab where it shows you how many players are online and you can see how much ep you have and if its possible make it to where if you click on say vengance runes it spawns you them and same with barrage runes and also for if you click on gear it spawns you some gear. how would i go about doing that? can someone tell me the codes to put in for it to be like that?

item.title: Quest Tab
item.dc:creator: @FoCuSeD_KiNeTiKz FoCuSeD_KiNeTiKz
item.description:
@FoCuSeD_KiNeTiKz wrote:

[quote=“Bumm85, post:2, topic:393293”]Well it depends on what revision and base you have. The commands will be similar but will not be the same. Please tell us what revision and base your using and I cna help.
For the ep and players online its pretty much the same so here are the codes.

Players online: +players+
and by ep im guessing you mean sorta like pk points

Ep: +pkpoints+ (change the pkpoints to whatever the ep is called in the character file)[/quote]
could you help me insert them in like with teamviewer cause i tried it and it still doesnt work its showing the other things still. and with ep i mean like extra potential in my server i have ep and it goes up by how much time you spend in a hotzone.

Read full topic

item.title: Quest Tab
item.dc:creator: @Bumm85 Bumm85
item.description:
@Bumm85 wrote:

Well it depends on what revision and base you have. The commands will be similar but will not be the same. Please tell us what revision and base your using and I cna help.
For the ep and players online its pretty much the same so here are the codes.

Players online: +players+
and by ep im guessing you mean sorta like pk points

Ep: +pkpoints+ (change the pkpoints to whatever the ep is called in the character file)

Read full topic
